de: "ALLEZ ON JOUE!" - Möge die Kraft des Spiels in Ihnen sein! 20 Jahre Erfahrung im Dienste einer Philosophie: SPIELEN FÜR DEN SPASS!
en: "Let the power of play be in you! 20 years of experience at the service of a philosophy: TO ENJOY BY PLAYING FOR FUN!
it: "Lascia che il potere del gioco sia in te! 20 anni di esperienza al servizio di una filosofia: DIVERTIRSI GIOCANDO!
fr: "ALLEZ ON JOUE !", que la force du Jeu soit en vous ! 20 ans d'expérience au service d'une philosophie : S’ÉPANOUIR EN JOUANT POUR LE PLAISIR !
es: "¡Deja que el poder del juego esté en ti! 20 años de experiencia al servicio de una filosofía: ¡DISFRUTAR JUGANDO POR DIVERSIÓN!
nl: "Laat de kracht van het spel in je zitten! 20 jaar ervaring in dienst van een filosofie: GENIETEN DOOR TE SPELEN VOOR HET GENIETEN!

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Mâcon Sud Bourgogne, Tourisme et Congrès

en:
"ALLEZ ON JOUE!" is a structure that allows everyone to BLOSSOM WHILE PLAYING FOR FUN!
Play is a way that allows everyone to evolve, share, forge links, learn, cooperate.
The longer we play, better off we will be!
We work with all audiences in different forms:
1. Activities and games organisation (games’ world tour, discovery and/or thematic games workshop-skill games, cooperative game, Challenge games, Foot-balls' world cup, Mölkky championship...) for your festive and convivial moments;
2. Traditional games and toys production workshop + training in the use and the making of games + Loan of games to allow to pursue or develop a playful dynamic within its structure or at home.
3. Team-buildings to improve the dynamics of your teams and the trust relationships between your employees.
4. Discussion workshop to reflect and share about the interests of the Game within our society.
5. Support for playful projects to implement actions based on gaming within a community or a territory.

So, this is 20 years of experience gained by its staff mediator in the service of philosophy: PLAY FOR FUN AND FRIENDLINESS!
